channel.title: Comments on: But it’s better than drinking alone
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
Dining alone is something I'm very much used to. Fuck em.
On the other side, you are a dark knight on a flame-breathing steed. And anyone worth their salt as a seer will know that.
Just so you know...
Maybe you should tell the waitress that next time. Perhaps she was waiting for a knight, but got too caught up with filling water glasses....
item.content:encoded:
Dining alone is something I’m very much used to. Fuck em.

On the other side, you are a dark knight on a flame-breathing steed. And anyone worth their salt as a seer will know that.

Just so you know…

Maybe you should tell the waitress that next time. Perhaps she was waiting for a knight, but got too caught up with filling water glasses….
